ShortDescription.Value: Adjust vehicle spawn rates, acceleration, braking, max speed, etc.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Vehicle Controller Vehicle Controller is a mod changing various aspects of vehicle spawning and behavior in the game. It allows you to select which building spawns which vehicles, adjust spawn probabilities for personal vehicles, and tweak vehicle properties like acceleration, top speed and braking.
## Service Vehicle Selection - Choose exactly which prefabs each service building is allowed to spawn - Build per-building lineups and copy/paste them across identical buildings, entire districts, or the whole map for quick setup - Your selections are saved with the city, ensuring consistent vehicle appearances every time you load
## Vehicle Property Packs In the default game, most personal cars have the same Acceleration, Top Speed and Braking. Vehicle Property Packs are the way to change this - Swap between preset packs that tweak max speed, acceleration, and braking for personal cars and trains - Property choices are persisted per save to ensure a consistent look and feel
## Speed Limits The game uses double speed limits for all roads. If a road has a speed limit of 50 km/h, vehicles will actually drive at 100 km/h. This mod allows you to override this behavior for more realistic speeds. - Choose Speed Limit Override for Realistic (0.5x), Vanilla (1x), Double (2x) or Super Speed (10x) - Works for Roads, Train Tracks, Subway Tracks, Tram Tracks and Waterways
### Vehicle Probability Packs - Load curated probability packs or create your own balance by adjusting sliders for every personal vehicle class - Probability choices are persisted per save to ensure a consistent look and feel - Example: You are tired of seeing Muscle Cars and Pickup Trucks in your small French city? Reduce probability for Muscle Cars and Pickup Trucks, more other vehicles will spawn! - Example: You are building a desert city in the US? Heavily increase the probability of Pickup Trucks, SUVs, decrease Hatchbacks!
## Side effects - Using speed limit override changes the amount of public transport vehicles on a line (e.g. half speed causes double the vehicles to maintain frequency)
## Misc - Integrated Stiffer Vehicles Mod into Vehicle Controller, with various improvements
## Planned Features/Suggestions - Vehicle Selection for more Service Types (e.g. Buses, Trains) - Property adjustment for Planes (Airplane Parameter Mod) and Helicopters - Better Icons for Vehicle Selection Copy and Paste Buttons - More curated Property Packs and Probability Packs from the community - Your suggestions?
